attributes.action: Reduce the level of taxation applied to Real Cider, Beer and Ale.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The level of taxation on the above mentioned products is to high and is a stumbling block for small producers of Cider, Beer and Ale. This products have been an integral part of British life for century's. So they should be protected by the goverment by way of been given tax breaks. 

These incentives should be exclusive to real cider, beer and ale, not mass produced products. This would help the producers reduce there prices to stay competitive in the market: E.g. One 500ml Bottle of Westons Vintage (a real cider)costs between £1.67 and £2.05 however you can buy a mass produced cider for £1.99 for four 440ml cans.

This is a British tradtion that needs help to stay alive!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to reduce the level of taxation applied to Real Cider, Beer and Ale.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
